Key Match Events: Bangladesh survives a last-ball drama to avoid a 3-run defeat
Zimbabwe requires 4 runs in 1 ball after a no-ball is called
Najmul Shanto scores his first international half-century
Shakib Al Hasan removed by Sean Williams
Litton Das caught by Tendai Chatara
Taskin Ahmed takes a wicket in the first over
Bangladesh wins the toss and opts to bat first
Pre-Game Insights: Bangladesh wins the toss and opts to bat first
Bangladesh Playing XI: Najmul Hossain Shanto, Soumya Sarkar, Litton Das, Shakib Al Hasan(c), Afif Hossain, Yasir Ali, Nurul Hasan(w), Mosaddek Hossain, Mustafizur Rahman, Hasan Mahmud, Taskin Ahmed
Zimbabwe Playing XI: Wesley Madhevere, Craig Ervine(c), Sean Williams, Sikandar Raza, Regis Chakabva(w), Milton Shumba, Ryan Burl, Tendai Chatara, Richard Ngarava, Brad Evans, Blessing Muzarabani
Team Changes: Yasir Ali replaces Mehidy Hasan for Bangladesh; Tendai Chatara replaces Luke Jongwe for Zimbabwe
